name: Carouse
description:
A new and exciting innovation has been made within the world of AI, introducing the Carouse!

The Carouse is a car that's the size of a mouse! It can figure out how to traverse a house of varying objects to reach a goal, in this case, cheese.

The quick and effective service of this truly ground-breaking AI is guaranteed to work! If not, we can always replace if with another one for no extra price!

So come and buy a Carouse today!

CONTROLS:

WASD to move.

that's about it :(
